places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Corbett Paradise

reviews.text:
Great place
Good food
Rooms are so good and spacious.

The location is excellent, but it is expensive considering the services offered. The food is satisfactory, although they do not have any Tandoor items. They do provide parking facilities, and the venue is particularly well-suited for wedding functions. However, the support staff lacks cooperation and should be more proactive in addressing consumer concerns.
There is no parking in the hotel. They park your vehicle in the government forest land. This is not safe.
Good for hosting party or for marriage
Nice wedding hall & very nice & best hotel at Kotdwara

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Grand Kailash
address: Kailash Shopping Complex, Najibabad Road, Jhanda Chowk, Kotdwar, Uttarakhand 246149, India

reviews.text: Had great experience of staying here. So neat and clean luxurious rooms, so good staff, scenic views and great quality delicious food. What else anyone will ek for? ☺

I hope this message finds you well. During my recent stay at this hotel, I encountered an issue with room allocation. Despite we were staying so long, hotel staff asked us to leave the rooms as they were having some reservation, we was not provided with the room we had requested to adjust us time being, which was disappointing and inconvenient. The receptionist is just money oriented and not co-operative. We believe it’s crucial to ensure accurate room assignments to uphold guest satisfaction but they have this kind of practice to ask to leave the room in every stay.

Very impressed by the amazing hospitality, good food and, clean and spacious rooms. Beautiful interior. Highly recommended!

Note to the staff: The QR code on the contact card is not working properly. Might want to check the cause.
Very Good Rroms And Staff Behaviour is very polite and helpful And the food is fantastic..

Good place with good amenity and parking
Only issue is heated water as it's on solar so if it's not sunny in winter than it's become a issue
Rest a very decent place with awesome service

places_with_reviews.name: Relaxx Hotel & Restaurant, Kotdwar - Best Hotel in Kotdwar | Best Restaurant In Kotdwar
address: Manpur, near Pencil Factory, Kotdwar, Uttarakhand 246149, India

reviews.text:
I stopped four to five times in the relax hotel
But today I booked two rooms I mean with my friend and with my friends, we had booked two rooms with 106 and 108 !
106 room numbers. In the Dustbin, I can not write here and see the page joining. Let us not have any problem, we should have money, but dirt was so dirt that I can not write it in it, we will come up with our family, then all this thing will come out here. What should I tell you? It should be seen less than the hotel's office, it should be said to your staff when you are taking the price, it is taking a rental in the hotel. Good cleaning is also good.There was very much dirt and this move is very dirty

Ambience and location is nice, needs improvement in cooking. Chicken was half cooked, coffee not upto the mark but vegetarian dishes like Paneer Tikka dry was good. They have a common toilet for male and female 🙄. Overall not a pleasant experience 😒.

Very very disappoint the behaviour of receptionist & electrician. We have taken 10 rooms , their was not worked of room'& intercom telephone, TV & water supply. People saying it will be take sometime but Two days they're not taken a action. Who are responsible about it we are paying all then facilities are not given.

places_with_reviews.name: MIX Grand Hotel Restaurant & Banquet

reviews.text:
Fantastic Retirement party experience! The venue was lively, the staff was attentive, and the atmosphere was vibrant. From the well-decorated space , it made  a memorable celebration. Highly recommend for anyone looking to host a lively event.
Special thanks to Mr Sp Sharma and team.

I would have rated this a 10 star for the service provided by the staff.
Very polite and accommodating staff.
Food was really good.
Clean rooms.
The manager and front dest staff were very polite and cheerful.
Made out stay a happy and free of hassles.
Thank you so much team mix grand.

Hakka noodles - the taste is good, they add a lot of veggies which makes it better, the quantity is good. One bowl is fit for 3 people.

French fries - 7 out of 10, were crispy.

Manchow soup - 8 out of 10.

Sonu shamra is great host.
He is fabulous. He is best in take caring of guest.
We went to this restaurant for birthday party.  We enjoyed the party with great food and good service. Thanks to Mr. Sonu Sharma and Mr. Deepak for providing good service.

places_with_reviews.name: Ambience Garden Resort
address: QG4G+JJ2, Kotdwar - Pauri Rd, Shivpur, Kotdwar, Uttarakhand 246149, India

reviews.text: It was a mesmerising trip. Went there for a marriage of my cousin. Food, ambience was truly awesome. People who serve at venue are very helpful and polite. Attaching the pic of chai wale uncle, made and served awesome tea.
Beautiful place and wonderful service. Suitable for meetings and conferences. Food is really delicious.
Very good place for marriage and partying g. Only draw back is lack of parking place, and approach road is quite narrow.
Great hospitality and services. Very friendly people. 100% recommend!
Got engaged at Ambience Resort. Wonderful place with an amazing view.

places_with_reviews.name: Capital O Sangam Hotel And Resort
address: o, Balasaur Rd, Ratanpur Sukhro, sukhro, Kotdwar, Uttarakhand 246149, India

reviews.text: Location is just okay. They have ample space for parking. Party lawn is spacious too. Decorations are good and night views are good. Food is below average and hygiene has been an issue. Rooms are just okay but clean. Wardrooms doesn’t have hot water in basin. Major pain area is quality of food and cutlery. Their food was served cold and food heaters were not working
Have attended wedding function , superb food, and what a variety 👌

Good place to host small functions or wedding. Decorations are nice, location is nice & easy to reach but at the same time food is pretty bad.
They don't have sense of keeping veg & non veg food in organised manner. Everything placed badly & unorganised.
Good place for marriage and party

Worst service ever! It has been pathetic experience.
No room service, telecoms not working. You will not even get water when asked. And please never plan a wedding there.They will ruin it !You will have to do all the work on behalf of waiters.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Bharat Bhoomi

reviews.text: Very bad experience.  Staff is un qualfied and un trained, rough talking staff sue to lack of training.  Not interested again.

worst hotel ever.!!!
1. No hygiene in the rooms , cutlery and bedsheets.
2. No proper maintenance of bathroom equipments like gyser , flush and shower
3. When reach out to the hotel staff for maintainance, they start to be defensive rather than work on the solution.
4. Ni wifi connection available all the time
5. No laundry service there
6. Just Visit kitchen , you will find ,how unhygienic it is.
7. No fork ,no knief is served, no milk is served, no tissue paper is served, just tasteless food is served.
It’s a decent place to stay for a halt. Room size is big but washrooms are average. The staff is very good. It is right next to the bus stop and very close to the local market
The staff is very co-operative and respectful, the rooms are well cleaned and maintained as always. It's a delight to stay here even for a night.
We had a good experience here yes I admit price was too high we had occupied 2 rooms that cost us 2600 but it was clean , hygiene, service was good room were clean.

places_with_reviews.name: HOTEL TRILOK
address: Near ICICI Bank, Devi Road, Sitabhpur, Motor Nagar, Kotdwar, Uttarakhand 246149, India

reviews.text: Very excelent room. Condition is top notch. Food is amazing must visit again. Food is amazing
No water in bathrooms  taps... It's 5th time I am calling reception for same issue.. fake 4 rating cirtificate on goibigo.  No t.v. subscription.

This place is in the heart of this small city. That being said, it will hold true for all nearby hotels as well. Cleanliness is okay. Food was good. The stay was expensive. One thing that their blankets don't have covers - it's a hygiene issue. We didn't have to stay the night so, we didn't bother. All rooms are open for smoking

A very nice hotel in Kotdwar, very near to the Route of Lansdowne with nice basic amenities. food at restaurant is delicious. Staff is friendly. They can arrange for your onward journey as well... We stayed here in exegency as the Local police doesn't allow vehicles to Lansdowne from Kotdwar after 10pm and before 4 am... But the stay was pleasant...

This is really a pathetic experience. I will not recommend this hotel. They are charging more on the name of Luxury but they don't know the meaning of luxury.

1. Not sufficient lighting in the room.
2. Untrained staff.
3. They have charged me more as compare to
tarrif displayed on site.
4. Cable wasn't working.
5. Smell in Bathroom.
6. Open Parking.

if you really looking any hotel in Kotdwar for stay then this is a bad choice.

places_with_reviews.name: HOTEL CROWN RESIDENCY
address: Hotel Crown residency beladat gharat road lalpur, kotdwar, Kotdwar, Shivpur, Uttarakhand 246149, India

reviews.text:
A decent place for rooms, the owner is very polite and helpful.
We were very late at night but the owner tried his best to get us hassle free navigation along with these arranged basic amenities.

Very good stay at a very reasonable cost. Experienced a very neat and clean and safe stay. Facilities and their way to treat guests is also nice. We highly recommend crown residency for staying if one visits kotdwar.

I have had a peaceful stay at this place. Staffs were cooperative. Location is about 2-3km from Kotdwar. Overall, the stay was good that I went back to the same hotel next day to stay for 1 more night. I would recommend this place to anyone.
Hotel building and rooms are neat and clean.toilets are also too clean.but they don't have restaurant but they arrange food by swiggy for you.
It is a good place in Kotdwar. It can be useful for party rooms weddings and many occasions. But it's located inside of the city. You can stay here when there are any other options you don't have.

places_with_reviews.name: HOTEL SURYA PLAZA
address: Badrinath Marg, Mohabewala Industrial Area, Kotdwar, Uttarakhand 246149, India

reviews.text: Wonderful place for family and friends,good atmosphere for celebrations with family and your loveing one

This hotel is located on the main road of Kotdwar to Lansdowne, it is just ~1.5hrs drive to Lansdown from here. Surrounding area is good and a nearby petrol pump is as well there. even famous Shri koteshwar mahadev temple is nearby. you can do Lansdown in just 4-5 hours including your lunch from here.
Hotel rooms are good enough for a 3 star hotel. Bathrooms were clean and food was very tasty. Parking is available just outside the hotel .   We stayed in their suite room and it was big enough to accommodate 4 of us.
Great place to have a beer with your friend.

Best hotel in the city. The manager Mr. Dhasmana is a very friendly and hospitable person. He personally attended to us. The food in the hotel is very delicious and best in the town all while being reasonably priced. Highly recommended for everyone who plans to visit Kotdwara.
The staff was very well behaved.

Hotel Surya Plaza is a budget property located at a distance of 0.5 km from Kotdwara pauri garhwal Railway Station.

This property offers a comfortable stay to the guests. Guests at this property are accommodated in 15 well-maintained rooms spread across 1 floor.

In-room amenities include premium bedding, adjustable windows, bottled drinking water, television and an attached bathroom.

Round the clock room service is offered at Hotel Surya Plaza. Front desk assistance is also available at the hotel.

Major tourist attractions includes
*Shree Balaji Mandir (1 km)
*Shree sidhbali baba dham mandir( 4km)   *Durga devi Mandir (8km),
*lansdowne Garhwal rifels cantontment  area (40km),
*Bhulla Tal (41 km), and
*Bhairav garhi mandir
*Tadkeshwar mahadev mandir
*Mahabgarh Mahadev (50 km).

This property is 1 km from Motor Nagar Bus Stand, 92 km from Rishikesh Railway Station and 105 km from Jolly Grant Airport.
